name: Martha's Exchange Restaurant & Brewing Company
description: A unique downtown Nashua destination, we offer an eclectic mix of the old and the new. From the old-world charm of our decor to our amazing confectionery delights at our candy shoppe, we've got something for everyone! We invite you to stop by! Once you've been to Martha's once, you'll be back.

locations.name: Main Brewpub
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Mon - Tue: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm
Wed: 11:00 am - 9:30 pm
Thu: 11:00 am - 11:00 pm
Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 1:00 am
Sun: 11:00 am - 9:30 pm
